items.title: It's surprising
items.content_html: It's surprising I can do this. I'm using Publii to post to a blog I set up on Github. It's pretty straightforward. he aim was to experiment with a flat file web site. I want to use plain text filesas the basis for a blog. A static site, obviously. But setting up Jekyll or Hugo or xyz seemed like a bit of work. Publii is seriously limited (e.g. just a handful of themes), but in a good way. It just gets the job done.

items.title: The First Post
items.content_html:
This is the first post I've written with Publii. It's a static web site generator, so I guess it's a bit like Jekyll or Hugo, except potentially easier to use.

I didn't write the first paragraph there - it's just an automated placeholder. In the near future I'll wite some of my very own words but first we have to get set up. Watch this space.
